project_path.SpaceSweepStake: contracts/SpaceSweepStake Full Smart Contract Security Audit/SpaceSweepStake

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` may cause OUT_OF_GAS exceptions if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Owner can change maximum transaction amount and exclude from the fee.
